<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A simple and fast domtree-based CSE pass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass does a simple depth-first walk over the dominator tree,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// eliminating trivially redundant instructions and using instsimplify to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// canonicalize things as it goes. It is intended to be fast and catch obvious</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cases so that instcombine and other passes are more effective. It is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// expected that a later pass of GVN will catch the interesting/hard cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#ab1e42734fad92b888f44ac4c1632d925">EarlyCSEPass</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;EarlyCSEPass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
